credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: The Butterfly
provenance: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
medium: Brush and oil paint on canvas
description: Horizontal view of woman in profile, holding  a fan in her right hand and sitting in a folding chair on a shaded spot of lawn;  tree foliage in background.  She gazes down on a butterfly resting  on the back of her left hand; another butterfly flits above the lawn  near the left edge of picture.
name: Painting
